price: Inni (Qur’aanni) siifi ummata keetiifis gorsa. Fuula dura ni gaafatamtu.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
